oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Universal Gysin formulas for flag bundles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Darondeau, Lionel
Pragacz, Piotr
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
Mathematics - Algebraic Topology
14C17, 14F05, 14M15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We give push-forward formulas for all flag bundles of types A, B, C, D. The formulas (and also the proofs) involve only Segre classes of the original vector bundles and characteristic classes of universal bundles. As an application, we provide new determinantal formulas.
Comment: v. 4, 16 pages, rewritten version with reverse order of roots
